name: Milk Trail
description:
Milk Trail is a difficult, co-op focused survival? cow defense game made within 72 hours for Ludum Dare 46. :)
In Milk Trail, you can:

- Go on a life changing journey.

- Root 'n toot.

- Blast bandits.

- Play with up to 2 other root 'tooters in local co-op.

- Purchase goods for extortionate prices.

- Face incredible winds.

It is possible to play Milk Trail using Steam Remote Play with relative ease, there are many tutorials around for playing non-Steam games with remote play if you choose to go that route.

Developed By:

Robin Field - Code & Art

Billy Hobson - Music & SFX

Thank you for playing!
